options.content:
# Tabular Data with Random Walk

This dashboard shows use of query namespacing and tabular data.

panels.description:
This example  shows panels displaying the Random Walk Time Series.

Time Series A is shown on 'Inbox Depth' and 'Active Workers'

Time Series B is shown on 'start rate' and 'Transactions'.

options.panelConfig:
---
# This panelConfig is intended for use with Svg1.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# YAML Aliases to simplify maintenance

anchorLinks:
  - link: &grafana-home
      url: "https://grafana.com/"
      params: "time"

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Panel Config

gradientMode: "hue"
cellIdPreamble: "cell-"
dataRefTransform:
  namespaced: true
  queries:
    A: {tabularKeyColumn: "name"}

cells: 
  drawio:
    link:
      url: "https://app.diagrams.net/?p=svgdata"
  docs:
    link:
      url: "https://github.com/andymchugh/andrewbmchugh-flow-panel/blob/main/README.md"
  inbox_depth:
    dataRef: "B.B-series"
    label:
      separator: "cr"
      units: "ops"
    labelColor:
      thresholds:
        - {color: "green", level: 0}
        - {color: "orange", level: 50}
    link: *grafana-home
  db_transactions:
    dataRef: "A.weight_height.csv.size"
    label:
      separator: "replace"
      units: "none"
    labelColor:
      thresholds:
        - {color: "green", level: 0}
        - {color: "orange", level: 400000}
    link: *grafana-home
  start_rate:
    dataRef: "A.browser_marketshare.csv.mediaType"
    label:
      separator: "replace"
      units: "none"
    link: *grafana-home
  active_workers:
    dataRef: "B.B-series"
    label:
      separator: "cr"
      units: "none"
      decimalPoints: 0
    labelColor:
      thresholds:
        - {color: "#888888", level: 0}
        - {color: "light-blue", level: 50}
    link: *grafana-home

panels.title: A Query set as 'tabular data (listPublicFiles-testdata)' - B query set as 'random-walk timeseries'
